name: Babble!
description:
BABBLE!

BABBLE is the classic car game where you choose a letter and try to come up with answers on that letter in different categories made for 2014! Can you name a Country, an Animal or an Actress starting on the letter "T" in just one minute?

Babble is packed with features, bonus categories, extra points and awards. Can you beat your friends in Babble?

*** Over 30 categories, ranging from Capitals, and Singers to Cars Brands and Hockey Teams!

*** Hundreds of thousands of words manually entered in a gigantic and unique database!

*** Filled with extra features! Check Stats, Leaderboards and Achievements!

*** Loads of amazing and fun Avatars for your profile!

*** Challenge friends, family och Facebook friends. Or why not a random opponent?

The ultimate classic car game is ready for the future. This Is BABBLE!
